title: How to choose my research field - Quora

response.answer_text: Interest in the field is of prime importance. Other than that the following also major factors to consider. Appropriate labs for researchYou definitely need a proper place with all the infrastructure and recourses to do the research that you want. Appropriate advisor for researchA good advisor is a crucial component in any research. There will be times when you get stuck in your research, at that time having a good advisor would be a life saver Appropriate funding for the researchAny research needs adequate funding. Look for a place and/or topic which has or can get you good funding.
